mapper.update:
update tbl_activity
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_activity set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity (id, owner, name, start_date, end_date, cost, description, create_time, create_by) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete:
delete from tbl_activity where id in
#{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_activity set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id, u1.name as owner, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.cost, a.description, a.create_time, u2.name as create_by, a.edit_time, u3.name as edit_by from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u1 on a.owner = u1.id join tbl_user u2 on a.create_by = u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on a.edit_by = u3.id order by a.create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_activity(id, owner, name, start_date, end_date, cost, description, create_time, create_by) values
(#{activity.id}, #{activity.owner}, #{activity.name}, #{activity.startDate}, #{activity.endDate}, #{activity.cost}, #{activity.description}, #{activity.createTime}, #{activity.createBy})
mapper.select: select a.id, u1.name as owner, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.cost, a.description, a.create_time, u2.name as create_by, a.edit_time, u3.name as edit_by from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u1 on u1.id = a.owner inner join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = a.create_by left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id = a.edit_by where a.id = #{id}

select a.id, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.id = a.owner inner join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on car.activity_id = a.id where car.clue_id = #{clueId}

select a.id, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.id = a.owner where a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and a.id not in ( select activity_id from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clue_id = #{clueId} )

select a.id, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.id = a.owner where a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and a.id in ( select activity_id from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clue_id = #{clueId} )
select a.id, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.id = a.owner where a.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
